data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
John Brooks blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
James Chester (Stoke) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a first substitution, with Dan Crowley replacing Jon Toral.
In the minute 65, Harlee Dean heads in to make it 0-1 at bet365 Stadium.
Birmingham make their second substitution with Marc Roberts replacing Jeremie Bela.
The home team replace Lee Gregory with Tyrese Campbell.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Tashan Oakley-Boothe with Nick Powell. This is the second substitution made today by Michael O'Neill.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's third substitution at bet365 Stadium with James McClean replacing Josh Tymon.
Morgan Fox (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, At bet365 Stadium, Sam Clucas has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Nick Powell gets an equalizer for Stoke. The score is now 1-1.
Birmingham's Adam Clayton has been booked in Stoke.
In the minute 87, Scott Hogan is on a sub for Lukas Jutkiewicz for Birmingham.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
